messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] ] Question - (OT sorta)
messages.msgSnippet: Shinsengumi what exactly?  You mean the NHK drama that s been running all year?  It does air on Saturdays in California (with subtitles--lucky CA people) and
messages.messageBody:
Shinsengumi what exactly? You mean the NHK drama that's been running
all year? It does air on Saturdays in California (with subtitles--lucky
CA people) and the regular NHK airing is Sundays. The Sunday Japanese
broadcast is about 6 weeks or so ahead of the subtitled version.

--Uh yeah, sorry. That drama series.
It's supposed to be airing right at this moment, but it's not. It's been
replaced with something about drums. o.O
Any idea why?

Then, the guide from my reciever/dish tends to be really screwy, so perhaps
they'll be airing it later on.

Miser Bellatrix

messages.subject: ] Question - (OT sorta)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Shinsengumi what exactly?  You mean the NHK drama that s been running all year?  It does air on Saturdays in California (with subtitles--lucky CA people)
messages.messageBody:
Miser Bellatrix wrote:

>Isn't the Shinsengumi supposed to be airing today? o.O
>
>
>
>
Shinsengumi what exactly? You mean the NHK drama that's been running
all year? It does air on Saturdays in California (with subtitles--lucky
CA people) and the regular NHK airing is Sundays. The Sunday Japanese
broadcast is about 6 weeks or so ahead of the subtitled version.

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
